data.title: Dassault Systèmes
data.meta_description: Wipro Technologies, the global IT business of Wipro Limited (NYSE:WIT) is a leading Information Technology, Consulting and Outsourcing company, that
data.text:
The alliance between Wipro and Dassault Systèmes enables organizations to benefit from the best-in–class consulting and implementation services from Wipro’s global domain expertise and deep knowledge on ENOVIA PLM and CATIA technology.

Wipro’s extensive experience in building & delivering a wide spectrum of compelling PLM solutions help organizations to effectively address challenges in managing innovation and product lifecycle management. Wipro’s unique value proposition of innovative and industry- specific PLM solutions are delivered through a dedicated team of domain consultants, certified professionals and technology experts. Wipro has engaged with more than 45 clients across industry verticals including Automotive, Aerospace, CPG, Industrial Manufacturing, Hi-Tech, Medical Devices and Semiconductor for delivering various PLM services including large End-to-End implementations.

The engineering capability maturity model (eCMM), adherence to stringent quality processes based on SEI and Six Sigma and the unique and self-developed ‘PLM Cook Book Methodology’ empowers our clients to reach far beyond the obvious and indulge in future ready PLM solutions. Wipro’s PLM Centre of Excellence (CoE) enables you to overcome the legacy system challenges and complexities.

Core Flex Delivery Model

Scalable sourcing model (Quick ramp up/down), best suited for fluctuating demands. Offshore centric model and reduced implementation cost.

PLM Lab Concept

Scalable replication of customer PLM environment for Proof-of-Concept, simulation of integrations, upgrades & migrations, concept reviews and validation of critical business use cases.

Managed Services

Structured approach of 24X7 support with level 1-2-3 and application availability, enabled use of ITIL v3 process model coupled with extensive tools usage.

Solutions offered by Wipro’s Product Lifecycle Management Practice:

New Product Introduction

Regulatory Compliance

Collaborative Global Design

Product Configuration

Global Program Management

Engineering Design Management

Engineering Change Management

Wipro empowers you to reach far beyond the obvious and indulge in future-ready PLM solutions. Typical business benefits we deliver are: Managing product innovation, greater ROI at lower cost of ownership, faster time-to-market and seamless migration.
